notes.player:
Manifest tests in your zone have Warp Rating +1 and sustaining psychic powers in your zone requires (free action) sustain check

Any Psychic Power being manifested within your zone increases its Warp Rating by 1, and any Psyker currently sustained a Psychic Power within Short Range of you must test to continue sustaining it as a Free Action. If you take this Talent again, Daemons within Short Range of you must make a Difficult (-10) Willpower Test at the start of their turn as long as they remain within Short Range of you. If they fail this test, they are suffer 3 + WilB Damage that ignores Armor.
